title: Adobe CC - Creative Cloud
description:
Adobe Creative Cloud

All the tools you love. Totally re-imagined.

Your favourite tools are about to get even better. Introducing Creative Cloud desktop applications, including Adobe Photoshop CC and Illustrator CC. They're the next generation of CS tools. Get hundreds of all-new features. New ways to keep your creative world in sync Ã¢â‚¬â€ feature updates, settings, and feedback from team members. And, as always, your applications live on your desktop, not in a browser and not in the cloud.


*** Install Adobe Application Manager 7.0

*** Use that to sign in and download apps

*** Overwrite amtlib.dll file when needed

*** Overwrite MuseOnAIR.swf in Adobe Muse 

*** Update all in Application Manager 7.0

*** Enjoy
